author: Aakash Jhaveri
title: Foxconn resumes iPhone production, albeit with numerous precautions
description: Foxconn is restarting iPhone production in China, proceeding cautiously with multiple new precautions in place.
content:
The upcoming iPhone 12 might be on schedule after all, as Foxconn has resumed operations in China. Aware of the current coronavirus situation, many extra precautions are being put into place for the safety of its employees.
China is on its way to get rid of … [+1894 chars]
